tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. The ID Shard, a diamond shaped pendant, swings in darkness.
Thirdrema, a western style town, stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
Wethermon, a metal samurai, stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
Kirin, a metal horse, rears in front of a red moon
A golden Reward Scales shift
Sunraku holds a two handed long sword and strikes at shadowy ghouls that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A headless horse and horseman gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over skeletal monsters
Wethermon draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
The Rebirth Tearjewel lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a moon blade. He runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
Text, 22, The walking air purifier
Her eyes shine
She looks away
He holds his hand over his wrist, glows, and disappears
A sword with a glowing line around the hilt
Label, Non-Standard Armament: Blade, Harbinger
just before Eleventar
Just beyond
She removes the straps of her orange overalls
She removes her sarashi, white cloth wrapped around her bare torso
He watches as her brown fur gets fluffier and fluffier
They both leap at him

Bilac hangs down his back, resembling long brown hair or a furry cape. Her head dangling from the bottom. Her overalls are wrapped around his neck like a cargo scarf. Emul sits in the overalls, holding onto his neck by her ears.
A pixelart Sunraku and camoflaged bunnies walks from the Prismatic Forest Grotto to Fourflokshire
Rocks poke through purple haze
Tall, white, cylindrical towers with colorful roofs line the streets. Towers range from 3 to 10 stories tall
People mill about along the greenery
Buildings dot the green campus with winding sidewalks.
Label, Fourth City, Fourfolkshire
Building labelled Item Shop
He picks up a simple blue bottle. 50,000 mahni.
A pixel art Sunraku and camoflaged bunnies walk from Fourfolkshire to the Canyon of Ancient Souls
Sunraku walks barefoot across dirt. The world is a purple haze with floating speckles of ash.
Bilac puts on gloves
Ash drifts among tall rocks resembling gnarled, branchless trees. The highest points are faint shadows in the thick, purple mist. Ash floats like snow.
Label, Canyon of Ancient Souls
Bilac walks beside Sunraku. She looks up at him. Emul rides on his shoulder. He's surrounded by a faint, pale halo.
He poses, showing off his scarred torso.
The ground shakes
A skeleton with legs, tail, wings, horns, fingers, and skull approaches.
It breaths, moving miasma in clouds. It's wings resemble charred paper. It's eyes glow red.
Label, Wyvern Zombie.
The wyvern zombie, about 10 feet long, eyes the party. It's tail flicks back and forth.
It takes a step, then notices
Lycagon's mark
The wyvern zombie flails wildly and runs away.
The wyvern zombie hides behind a rock.
Several more hide nearby
They look forward
A headless horse covered in armor, ridden by a headless knight. A dark aura surrounds the pair. Label, Rare Enemy, Dullahan General.
Dullahan raises its corroded sword.
He equips his Empire Bee Twinblades
Bilac equips a hammer.
The dullahan rears up, raises a sword, and charges
He glows red
She covers her mouth with a scarf. He runs at the dullahan
The dullahan swings. He ducks.
He plants a foot and swings a blade
Parry
Dullahan swings. Sunraku leaps back.
He jumps up, spins, and strikes. Dullahan parries.
Dullahan swings. He jumps back.
Wethermon swings. Kirin deploys missiles.
Sunraku runs, circling the dullahan.
He draws a golden X in the air
Drops ripple in the air behind the dullahan.
Golden strikes hit the dullahan in the back. It looks around.
The dullahan falls
Bilac pours out a blue bottle over her hand and hammer
She swings the hammer at the falling dullahan, sending him flying
Emul holds on to his bird mask in one hand, and equips a grimoire in the other. The pair shoot straight into the air. He looks down at the ground and sees Bilac, beckoning.
The dullahan tumbles through the air. It flies near a rock and grabs. Once stopped, the dullahan propels itself back towards Sunraku.
Sunraku dodges
He makes a fist, which bursts into crimson flame. Luck stat, 104
He flies at the dullahan and punches it in the back.
Resting on his arm, she fires 3 strikes
She runs towards the falling dullahan. Its horse gallops.
She places the hammer on the ground. It erupts in flames.
The fiery hammer makes contact
And flings the dullahan spinning back towards the horse.
The pair smash into a rock, obscured by mist.
Sunraku watches from above.
The dullahan dissipates
The corroded sword lies on the ground. Label, dropped item, Dullahan General's Decapitator.
Above the grip, the guard is scuffed and dented, with an unblemished red jewel in the center. The flat of the blade is dull and covered in dark patches.
He opens his party list, and clicks Bilac. Level 98, Master Craftsman, Sub Archaeologist, Vorpal bunny, Master smith.
He unequips the decapitator
Ash flutters around them
A figure lurks behind a rock
Text, 27, I reincarnated into a trash game?!
He opens his eyes. Princess Fearia, a blond elf with blue eyes, looks down at him, backdropped by glowing gold light.
A poop shaped slime punches him in the face.
The demon king's mouth flies open and shut rapidly
He throws a sword into the demon king's forehead
